name.en: Social Media Copilot - Xiaohongshu and Douyin Copilot Data collection tools

short.en: Operational auxiliary tools for social media platforms such as Xiaohongshu and Douyin.

long.en:
Providing various auxiliary functions on social media platforms for convenient extraction of needed content. 
Currently supported platforms are: Douyin, Xiaohongshu.

Xiaohongshuâœ¨
âœ… Watermark-free video download: One-click download of the current noteâ€™s watermark-free video. 
âœ… Note image export: One-click export of the current note's image list, including live photos. 
âœ… Note copy: One-click copy of the current note's title and content. 
âœ… Comment data export: One-click export of all comments on the note for further analysis and management. 
âœ… Batch comment data export: Export comments for multiple notes at once based on note ID or link. 
âœ… Batch export of note data and materials: Export the basic information and materials (pictures, videos) of multiple notes at once based on note ID or link, also available for batch export by creator ID or link. 

Douyinâœ¨
âœ… Watermark-free video download: One-click download of the current videoâ€™s watermark-free version. 
âœ… Image collection export: One-click export of the current image collection's image list. 
âœ… Collection export: One-click export of all video data in the current collection. 
âœ… Comment data export: One-click export of all comments on the video for further analysis and management. 
âœ… Batch comment data export: Export comments for multiple videos at once based on video ID or link. 
âœ… Batch export of video data and materials: Export the basic information and materials (image collections, videos) of multiple videos at once based on video ID or link, also available for batch export by influencer ID or link. 

ğŸ†• Version History
- v0.0.7
  Fixed the issue of abnormal export links for notes based on the blogger in Xiaohongshu.
  Resolved the bug that caused interruptions when exporting comments from Douyin.
  Corrected the misalignment issue when exporting Douyin videos to Excel.
  Xiaohongshu now supports exporting original images.
- v0.0.6
  Fixed the issue with the comment export function not working after Xiaohongshu's update. 
  Kept empty rows for deleted notes/videos when exporting note/video data. 
  Supported internationalization. 
- v0.0.5
  Xiaohongshu platform now supports exporting live photos. 
  Douyin platform now supports exporting video collections. 
- v0.0.4
  Fixed issues causing some functions to be unusable due to permission problems. 
  Added the ability to select materials for export when exporting videos based on influencers on Douyin. 
- v0.0.3
  Fixed the issue with Xiaohongshu note export functionality being ineffective. 
- v0.0.2
  Supported direct access to business platforms for Xiaohongshu and Douyin. 
  Supported export of creator information and work data based on creator ID or link for Xiaohongshu and Douyin. 
- v0.0.1
  Supported downloading note materials, copying text, exporting comments, and batch exporting note data on Xiaohongshu. 
  Supported downloading video materials, exporting comments, and batch exporting video data on Douyin.
